subject: Hockey, Ice
College Athletics
NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Matt Frattin lost his athletic scholarship at North Dakota after two arrests, but fought his way back and will play in the N.C.A.A. Frozen Four.
snippet: Matt Frattin lost his athletic scholarship at North Dakota after two arrests, but fought his way back and will play in the N.C.A.A. Frozen Four.
